name: Jukebox Plus
description: Jukebox Plus gives you a powerful interface for managing Roll20 audio. Organize tracks into custom albums, tag them, add descriptions and images, and play them using intuitive controls. Features include batch loop/stop/play, Now Playing view, color or image tagging, Announce-to-chat, Mix Mode with random accents, keyword search, playlist support, and full backup/restore tools. Type `!jb` in chat to open the interface.
